channel.title: How do i spawn monsters[NPC]S and put items in shops
channel.description: how do i spawn monstersNPCS and how do i put items in shops

item.title: How do i spawn monsters[NPC]S and put items in shops
item.dc:creator: @hey_w8_u_nub hey w8 u nub
item.description:
@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

Go to shops.cfg and there’s list of numbers. find some shop, what your server got, then the first number is shop id leave it alone.
then, the next number is item id. like this: 1050 100
for 100 santas. the 2nd number is amount.
for npc’s check my guide. it got more than only autospawn. LOL http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294154.0.html

Read full topic
